title: Single member districts encourage two parties

content.question: An electoral system based on single-member districts is usually characterized by

choices.label: strong, centralized political parties and a weak executive
higher rates of voter turnout than are common in other systems
legislative representation of each party in proportion to the number of votes it receives
domination of the legislature by two political parties

content.answer: domination of the legislature by two political parties

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
